name: Delay the President
description:
You play as bodyguard of the president of an infamous food company. Following the recent controversy on chip bag sizes, you fear that his days are counted. Make good use of your remaining service as a bodyguard and delay the inevitable.

Controls

  • LMB - Jump
  • RMB - Dash (when available)
  • R - Restart (restarts automatically on gameover)

Credits

Art by @Raindrinker

Music

Overriding Concern by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4187-overriding-concern
